description: Enable a resource that has been published in the CloudFormation Registry.

LogGroupName.description: The Amazon CloudWatch log group to which CloudFormation sends error logging information when invoking the type's handlers.

LogRoleArn.description: The ARN of the role that CloudFormation should assume when sending log entries to CloudWatch logs.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the extension.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the extension.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:([0-9]{12})?:type/.+  

Update requires: No interruption

ExecutionRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM execution role to use to register the type. If your resource type calls AWS APIs in any of its handlers, you must create an IAM execution role that includes the necessary permissions to call those AWS APIs, and provision that execution role in your account. CloudFormation then assumes that execution role to provide your resource type with the appropriate credentials.
ExecutionRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM execution role to use to register the type. If your resource type calls AWS APIs in any of its handlers, you must create an IAM execution role that includes the necessary permissions to call those AWS APIs, and provision that execution role in your account. CloudFormation then assumes that execution role to provide your resource type with the appropriate credentials.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

PublisherId.description: The publisher id assigned by CloudFormation for publishing in this region.
PublisherId.markdownDescription:
The publisher id assigned by CloudFormation for publishing in this region.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 40  

Pattern: [0-9a-zA-Z]{40}  

Update requires: No interruption

LoggingConfig.description: Specifies logging configuration information for a type.
LoggingConfig.markdownDescription:
Specifies logging configuration information for a type.

---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

PublicTypeArn.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) assigned to the public extension upon publication
PublicTypeArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) assigned to the public extension upon publication

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 1024  

Pattern: arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:([0-9]{12})?:type/.+  

Update requires: No interruption

AutoUpdate.description: Whether to automatically update the extension in this account and region when a new minor version is published by the extension publisher. Major versions released by the publisher must be manually updated.
AutoUpdate.markdownDescription:
Whether to automatically update the extension in this account and region when a new minor version is published by the extension publisher. Major versions released by the publisher must be manually updated.

---

Required: No

Type: boolean     

Update requires: No interruption

TypeNameAlias.description: An alias to assign to the public extension in this account and region. If you specify an alias for the extension, you must then use the alias to refer to the extension in your templates.
TypeNameAlias.markdownDescription:
An alias to assign to the public extension in this account and region. If you specify an alias for the extension, you must then use the alias to refer to the extension in your templates.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 10  

Maximum Length: 204  

Pattern: [A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}(::MODULE){0,1}  

Update requires: No interruption

VersionBump.description: Manually updates a previously-enabled type to a new major or minor version, if available. You can also use this parameter to update the value of AutoUpdateEnabled
VersionBump.markdownDescription:
Manually updates a previously-enabled type to a new major or minor version, if available. You can also use this parameter to update the value of AutoUpdateEnabled

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

MajorVersion.description: The Major Version of the type you want to enable
MajorVersion.markdownDescription:
The Major Version of the type you want to enable

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 100000   

Update requires: No interruption

TypeName.description:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.
TypeName.markdownDescription:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: [A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}(::MODULE){0,1}  

Update requires: No interruption

Type.markdownDescription:
The kind of extension

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption
